Package controller

Class AppManager

java.lang.Object
controller.SceneController
controller.AppManager
public class AppManager extends SceneController
A class to manage the application's toy inventory. Extends AppMenu class to inherit the menu interface for user interaction.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AppManager()
    Constructor to create an instance of AppManager and load toy data from the text file.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppManager

      public AppManager()
      Constructor to create an instance of AppManager and load toy data from the text file.

  • Method Details

    • loadFile

      public static void loadFile()
      Method to load toy data from the text file and create Toy objects. Uses BufferedReader and FileReader objects to read from the text file. Each line of the text file is split into an array of Strings to create Toy objects. Toy objects are added to the ArrayList. If any error occurs during file reading, it is printed to the console.

    • saveFile

      public static void saveFile()
      Method to save toy data to the text file. Uses FileWriter and PrintWriter objects to write to the text file. Each Toy object in the ArrayList is formatted into a String using the format method of the Toy class. The formatted String is written to the text file. If any error occurs during file writing, it is printed to the console.

    • purchaseName

      public static ArrayList<Toy> purchaseName(String x)
      Returns an ArrayList of Toy objects that contain the specified string in their name.
      Parameters:
      x - the input string to search for in toy names
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Toy objects containing the specified string

    • purchaseS_N

      public static ArrayList<Toy> purchaseS_N(String x)
      Returns an ArrayList of Toy objects that have the specified serial number.
      Parameters:
      x - the serial number to search for
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Toy objects with the specified serial number

    • remove

      public static ArrayList<Toy> remove(String x)
      Removes and returns an ArrayList of Toy objects that have the specified serial number.
      Parameters:
      x - the serial number to search for and remove
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Toy objects with the specified serial number that have been removed from the main ArrayList

    • purchaseType

      public static ArrayList<Toy> purchaseType(String x)
      Returns an ArrayList of Toy objects that are of the specified type.
      Parameters:
      x - the type of toy to search for
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Toy objects with the specified type

    • inputSN

      public static Boolean inputSN(String x)
      Validates a string as a serial number for a toy.
      Parameters:
      x - the string to validate
      Returns:
      true if the string is a valid serial number, false otherwise

    • addFigures

      public static void addFigures(String SN, String name, String brand, double price, int stock, int age, String type) throws CustomExeptionClass
      Adds a new figure to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      SN - the serial number of the figure
      name - the name of the figure
      brand - the brand of the figure
      price - the price of the figure
      stock - the stock of the figure
      age - the age range for which the figure is appropriate
      type - the type of figure (a for action figure, d for doll, h for horse)
      Throws:
      CustomExeptionClass - if price, stock, or age are negative or if the type is not a, d, or h

    • addAnimals

      public static void addAnimals(String SN, String name, String brand, double price, int stock, int age, String Material, String size) throws CustomExeptionClass
      Adds a new animal toy to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      SN - the serial number of the animal toy
      name - the name of the animal toy
      brand - the brand of the animal toy
      price - the price of the animal toy
      stock - the stock of the animal toy
      age - the age range for which the animal toy is appropriate
      Material - the material of the animal toy
      size - the size of the animal toy (s for small, m for medium, l for large)
      Throws:
      CustomExeptionClass - if price, stock, or age are negative or if the size is not s, m, or l

    • addPuzzles

      public static void addPuzzles(String SN, String name, String brand, double price, int stock, int age, String type) throws CustomExeptionClass
      Adds a new puzzle to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      SN - the serial number of the puzzle
      name - the name of the puzzle
      brand - the brand of the puzzle
      price - the price of the puzzle
      stock - the stock of the puzzle
      age - the age range for which the puzzle is appropriate
      type - the type of puzzle (m for mosaic, c for crossword, l for logic, t for trivia, r for riddle)
      Throws:
      CustomExeptionClass - if price, stock, or age are negative or if the type is not m, c, l, t, or r

    • addBoard_Games

      public static void addBoard_Games(String SN, String name, String brand, double price, int stock, int age, int min, int max, String size) throws CustomExeptionClass
      Adds a new board game to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      SN - the serial number of the board game
      name - the name of the board game
      brand - the brand of the board game
      price - the price of the board game
      stock - the stock of the board game
      age - the age range for which the board game is appropriate
      min - the minimum number of players for the board game
      max - the maximum number of players for the board game
      size - the size of the board game (e.g. standard, travel, deluxe)
      Throws:
      CustomExeptionClass - if price, stock, or age are negative or if min is greater than max
